articles.title: Puri Jagannadh completes 20 years in films. Karan Johar congratulates him - India Today
articles.description: Telugu director Puri Jagannadh has completed 20 years in films. Charmme Kaur and Karan Johar took to social media to congratulate him on this achievement.
articles.content:
It has been 20 years since Puri Jagannadh made his debut as a filmmaker in the Telugu film industry. His friend and business partner, Charmme Kaur, took to Twitter to share a fan-made poster that had photos of the 20 films he had directed.
